dormitory.title: Basic Triple
dormitory.description: Triple occupancy in the Kaufmann building. Each room has a twin bed and twin bunk with shared bathrooms and showers in the hallways.

basic.title: Basic Double
basic.description: Double occupancy in the Elm building. Each room has two twin beds with shared bathrooms and showers in the hallways.

standard.title: Standard
standard.description: Double occupancy in the Maple or Blue Heron buildings. Rooms have queen and twin beds with bathrooms shared between two rooms.

plus.title: Standard Plus
plus.description: Double occupancy in the Scheuer, Pine, Weinberg & May buildings. All rooms have private bathrooms, with a mix of queen and twin beds.

camper.title: Camper
camper.description: Bring your own tent, sleeping bag, and towel. Includes all meals, programming, and access to bathrooms and hot showers.

commuter.title: Commuter
commuter.description: Includes all meals and programming. Does not include any overnight lodging.

online_connection.title: Digital Connection
online_connection.description: Participate in JMR32 from home via our Digital Connection option.
